title: add ant task to generate optionally ALL javadocs
description:
As of jira LUCENE-3977 the generation of javadocs has been cleaned up and is now set fix to 'noindex' to keep distributions small.

An ant task should make this selectable to have the option for really building ALL javadocs.

comments.content:
I think its fine to expose this as a property. I'll add it to the wiki.

I ran ant -Djavadoc.noindex=false javadocs-lint with java6 and 7 and everything looked fine.
comments.author: Robert Muir
